examples.example: 我们小组的成员都齐心协力，共同完成了这个艰难的任务。

translate.english: All the members of our group worked together with one heart and one mind and jointly completed this difficult task.

examples.example: 我们的小组充满了活力与创造力，总是能出色地完成各种任务。

translate.english: Our group is full of vitality and creativity, and always can excellently complete various tasks.

examples.example: 我们的小组就像一个温暖的大家庭，大家相互帮助，共同进步。

translate.english: Our group is like a warm big family, and everyone helps each other and makes progress together.
